headline: NextEra Energy's Tough Love: Is It a Buy After Cutting XPLR Infrastructure Loose?
summary: NextEra Energy (NYSE: NEE) is one of the largest regulated utilities in the United States.  This combination has led to impressive growth for NextEra Energy, notably including its dividend.  There has been a little wrinkle in the growth story, however, represented by a limited partnership now known as XPLR Infrastructure (NYSE: XIFR).
